answers.answer: I have been wondering about a situation like this. I've had high blood pressure since 32 weeks and am currently 35 weeks, I go to the docter weekly to have my blood pressure monitored and have a feeling they will end up inducing me a little early. I'm not complaining if they do, I just hope no matter what happens I have a healthy baby.
Congratulations! You will be holding your beautiful baby soon!
Your "most" likely suffering from pre eclampsia?? Your getting induced because your doctor thinks and doesn't even know for sure that you have pre eclampsia? Is he drawing blood to confirm it?

question: I'm almost 38 weeks  and went to do my regular visit with my obgyn today.  Last week my BP was pretty high and so when they took it this week it was still really elevated.  My urine came back with protein in it and so they explained I was most likely suffering from preeclampsia and we are now being induced at 4.  I'm a bit nervous because there is so much to do at home and I wanted to get it all done before he got here!! But ready or not he is coming!! So ready to see our little miracle :)
title: Inducing b/c of Preeclampsia
